amendment.description: To amend the Aviation and Transportation Security Act.

vote.text: Amendment SA 26 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 26 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S1412; text: CR S1412) To amend the Aviation and Transportation Security Act.
